column2: I'd have to say that Smoque BBQ is one of the best I've places I've ever been to.  The meat was moist and great.  I had the brisket and rib plate with macaroni cheese and beans.  Although I like to go to Barbeque joints to enjoy their meat and the occasional side dish that will most likely hit or miss
column3: this place got it all right.. actually their sides shot my opinion about this place through the roof.  Seriously though
column8: freaking good. I'll be definitely going back when I visit the Windy City again.
